title: Project Hoodie Still no sign of shipping
body: So the Project hoodie was said to be delivered in October 2016 and it is almost the end of November 2016. Its like going to be 2 months delayed. Im pretty upset at riot games for being unable to deliver a product within the time frame. I understand the hurricane caused delays but i cannot imagine it having lasted 2 months.

replies.body:
Riot Games Merch
November 17 at 12:45pm Â· 
PROJECT HOODIE SHIPPING UPDATE:
We wanted to apologize to everyone for the delay on shipping the PROJECT: Hoodie out to you and give you a detailed update. The hoodies for European countries were picked up from the manufacturer today and are on their way to the warehouse to start shipping out. They should arrive to the warehouse next Friday to be checked in and start being packaged and sent. The hoodies for North America are scheduled to leave manufacturing on Monday for the warehouse and should arrive by Thursday.
We are sorry these took longer than expected and you had to wait an extra month for them. We are excited for this hoodie and think they turned out great. We will post updates here every few days on the status so you know exactly where they are at during these final steps. Thanks again for all the patience we are truly humbled by having such a great community and we will work harder to hit the expectations we set with you in the future.



Taken from their facebook post at the date and time given
Same here been waiting a full month for mine and still no sign. This will be my second ticket on the matter.

*ChocolatChan* beat me to punch, but other than the information they provided, I'd recommend keeping an eye on the [Riot Games Merch Facebook Page](https://www.facebook.com/RiotGamesMerch/) for any further updates on this situation.

There are teammates around me who are all waiting on their PROJECT hoodies as well, so we feel ya. :/

Let me know if you have any questions.
Your are not the only one im still waiting too.
